amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to add expertise in consumer privacy to the membership of the Consumer Advisory Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Case.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
